OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: Bogota Chamber of Commerce
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: The Bogota Chamber of Commerce is a private, non-for-profit organization whose goal is to foster a sustainable Bogota-Region in the long term, by promoting its residents' prosperity, through services which enhance and strengthen the enterprise capabilities present in the region, and which improve the business environment with an impact over public policies.

OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: Pakistan Centre for Philanthropy
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: The PCP Certification Programme seeks to bring transparency, accountability and good governance in the nonprofit sector in Pakistan. The first initiative of its kind in South Asia; it involves the evaluation of a nonprofit organisation on standardised parameters of internal governance, financial management and programme delivery.

OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: National Official Business Register
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the business register.

OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: Tax Identification Number
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the tax register.

OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: The National Court Register
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the court register.

OrganisationRegistrationAgency.name: Slovakia Ministry Of Interior Trade Register
OrganisationRegistrationAgency.description: Most organisations (including NGOs) have to be registered with the Ministry of Interior for the Trade Register Of The Slovak Republic (Živnostensky Register Slovenskej Republiky) and are allocated a unique registration number
